name: Web2JSON Agent Studio
description: Agentic AI system that automates conversion of unstructured webpages into structured JSON. Implemented multi-step agent workflows with validation, retries, and grounding via RAG, significantly reducing manual data extraction effort and errors.

name: AI Resume Chatbot Twin
description: Built a resume chatbot that allows recruiters to query candidate experience using natural language. Implemented RAG to ensure grounded and accurate responses from structured resume data.

name: Dynamic Attendance Management System
description: Role-based web application for managing, updating, and tracking attendance for students, teachers, and administrators with secure workflows and scalable UI architecture.
